Self.Wiki: Determines the configuration of jiggle bones within FLVER models.

ctrlType.Wiki: The setup type used for setting up the jiggler.

calcType.Wiki: The calculation type to use with the jiggler.

dmyPolyId.Wiki: The dummy polygon ID to apply the jiggler to. Only valid if the control type is set to Dummy Polygon.

strCtrlBoneName.Wiki: The bone name to apply the jiggler to. Only valid if the control type is set to Skeleton.

axisX.Wiki: The axis to treat as the X-axis (so that it does not overlap with other axes).

axisY.Wiki: The axis to treat as the Y-axis (so that it does not overlap with other axes).

axisZ.Wiki: The axis to treat as the Z-axis (so that it does not overlap with other axes).

bUseFollowBaseBone.Wiki: If ON, the jiggler will follow the root bone.

limitAngleDeg_MinX.Wiki: The minimum angle for the X-axis. In degrees.

limitAngleDeg_MaxX.Wiki: The maximum angle for the X-axis. In degrees.

limitAngleDeg_MinY.Wiki: The minimum angle for the Y-axis. In degrees.

limitAngleDeg_MaxY.Wiki: The maximum angle for the Y-axis. In degrees.

behaviorParamId.Wiki: The rotation behavior parameter to use.

behaviorSlideParamId.Wiki: The movement behavior parameter to use.

limitOffset_MinX.Wiki: The minimum position offset for the X-axis.

limitOffset_MaxX.Wiki: The maximum position offset for the X-axis.

limitOffset_MinY.Wiki: The minimum position offset for the Y-axis.

limitOffset_MaxY.Wiki: The maximum position offset for the Y-axis.

limitOffset_MinZ.Wiki: The minimum position offset for the Z-axis.

limitOffset_MaxZ.Wiki: The maximum position offset for the Z-axis.

behaviorWorldFixParamId.Wiki: The parameter ID to use when the jiggler is attached to the ground.

behaviorTargetBoneRateParamId.Wiki: The parameter ID to use for determining the percentage rate from a specified joint.

followBaseBone_SpineFollowRateRot.Wiki: Used if Follow Root Bone is ON. The tracking rate to the new position after the rotation of the root bone for the spine.

followBaseBone_SpineFollowRatePos.Wiki: Used if Follow Root Bone is ON. The tracking rate to the new position after the movement of the root bone for the spine.

followBaseBone_OffsetX.Wiki: Used if Follow Root Bone is ON. The follow position offset on the X-axis for the spine when movement of the root bone occurs.

followBaseBone_OffsetY.Wiki: Used if Follow Root Bone is ON. The follow position offset on the Y-axis for the spine when movement of the root bone occurs.

followBaseBone_OffsetZ.Wiki: Used if Follow Root Bone is ON. The follow position offset on the Z-axis for the spine when movement of the root bone occurs.
